description:
The cyberpunk metropolis Shinjuku—a massive city-state bedecked with neon signs, towering skyscrapers, and the latest cutting-edge technology. It is here, in year 2099 of the Fused Era, where the legendary Demon Lord Veltol has his second coming five centuries in the making. But this landscape is nothing like the one he conquered all those years ago, for the fusion of magic and engineering has elevated civilization to dazzling, unprecedented heights. Veltol may have been reduced to a historical footnote, but make no mistake…this brave new world will be his for the taking!

(Source: Yen Press)
synonyms: 魔王2099: THE LORD OF IMMORTALS BLOOMING IN THE ABYSS E.E. 2099
Maou 2099:THE LORD OF IMMORTALS BLOOMING IN THE ABYSS E.E. 2099

tags.name: Cyberpunk
tags.description: Set in a future of advanced technological and scientific achievements that have resulted in social disorder.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Dystopian
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a society characterized by poverty, squalor or oppression.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Anti-Hero
tags.description: Features a protagonist who lacks conventional heroic attributes and may be considered a borderline villain.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: VTuber
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is either an actual or fictive VTuber.

tags.name: Artificial Intelligence
tags.description: Intelligent non-organic machines that work and react similarly to humans.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

Affiliated with Magic Capsule, a recording studio led by his father [Susumu Aketagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/120062).

__Label:__ Sony Music Japan (Since 2022)

__[Website](https://shiyui.jp) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Shiyui_0111) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/72320879) |[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCXgMg81GVAzdFWQNJFKiJgQ) | [NicoNico](https://www.nicovideo.jp/user/117211278) | [Spotify (Shiyui)](https://open.spotify.com/artist/16ROxNSgWNSQIuIO8gNQyz) | [Spotify (シユイ)](https://open.spotify.com/artist/3EKiz61ZCQs4LK3O96mt5O)__

__Shiyui__ is a Japanese singer and Illustrator.
ADR Engineer at FUNimation Entertainment, however has since expanded to also being a Mixing Engineer.
Matheus Périssé is a brazilian actor, voice actor, dubbing director, singer, presenter and youtuber.

[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/jandmota/)

Janderson Oliveira da Mota is a Brazilian translator, japanese teacher, and podcaster.
